item.title: [stx] Teachings of the Archaics
item.description:
Sorcery — Lesson

If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw two cards. Draw three cards instead if an opponent has at least four more cards in hand than you.

https://twitter.com/MythicMikaela/status/1377051450937860097

item.title: [stx] Verdant Mastery
item.description:
Sorcery

You may pay {3}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

Search your library for up to four basic land cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the {3}{G} cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

https://twitter.com/brendan905/status/1377092652693397506

item.title: [stx] Culmination of Studies
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.

https://twitter.com/Marshall_LR/status/1376957012370579461

item.title: [stx] Baleful Mastery
item.description:
Instant

You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

If the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card.

Exile target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [stx] Expressive Iteration
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, then exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.

item.title: [stx] Codie, Vociferous Codex
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Construct

You can't cast permanent spells.

{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/Deathsie/status/1376746353414537216

item.title: [stx] Strixhaven Stadium
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}. Put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium.

Whenever a create deals combat damage to you, remove a point counter from Strixhaven Stadium.

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium. Then if it has ten or more point counters on it, remove them all and that player loses the game.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/strixhaven

item.title: [stx] "I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So"
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.

"I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So" deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

Exile "I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So".

item.title: [stx] "Forum Mooderator"
item.description:
Creature — Minotaur Shaman

Whenever "Forum Mooderator" attacks, you may put an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to the bottom of your library. If you do, exile top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards.

item.title: [stx] "Approach of the Dragon"
item.description:
Sorcery

"Approach of the Dragon" deals 3 damage to each opponent. Then you may exile "Approach of the Dragon" and four other cards named "Approach of the Dragon" from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it into the battlefield, then shuffle.

A deck can have any number of cards named "Approach of the Dragon".
